name: Penguin Food Collector
description:
Penguin Food Collector.

Made in less than 24 hours for Mini Jam 94: Baking (You had 72 hours, but I just worked really quickly😎)

The theme is "Baking" and the restriction is that you can only use 2 buttons.

A game about a penguin that collects food.

Get the right ingredients, or else... you will DIE! (Oh no!)

Credits: Made using Unity Engine. Art made in Aseprite. Background Music: https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles">https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles Score Sound: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style">https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style Death Sound: Girl_Two_Screams.wav https://www.freesound.org/people/tcrocker68/sounds/235595/">https://www.freesound.org/people/tcrocker68/sounds/235595/ http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/">http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/
